text.description:
We recreated some of the most delicious food from Disney parks to reward the reactors for guessing the correct food trivia question! Knew It AND Chew It is back! Subscribe to @PeopleVsFood for new videos every week! Check out more Knew It Or Chew It videos here! https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL73YndQawY3Nkg659L95gT5lbyNLFoNE6
Check out our NEW channel Bullseye! https://www.youtube.com/@REACTbullseye
FOLLOW US EVERYWHERE: TIKTOK: https://www.tiktok.com/@peoplevfood FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/PeopleVsFoodbyReact/ TWITTER: https://twitter.com/peoplevfood INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/peoplevfood/
YOUTUBE CHANNELS: PVF CHEF: https://www.youtube.com/@PvFChef REACT: http://www.youtube.com/REACT BULLSEYE: https://www.youtube.com/@REACTbullseye
Content featured: Mickey Cinnamon Roll https://www.tiktok.com/@trisbthom/video/7075839215782661422
Tiana's Gumbo https://www.tiktok.com/@delanzo337/video/7316976021968866606
Casey's Celebration Dog https://www.instagram.com/reel/CpAe-__PMtC/?igsh=MWQ1ZGUxMzBkMA==
Tonga Toast - Polynesian https://www.tiktok.com/@eyntkinfo/video/7286551961137089835
Cheesy Flopover Pizza https://www.tiktok.com/@firstdateguide/video/7231734567894371626
Baymax Curry https://www.tiktok.com/@foodwithmichel/video/7221329259862838574
Jack Jack Num Nums https://www.tiktok.com/@_breannabrooks/video/7330065513537604906
Featuring: Jayka https://www.instagram.com/jayka.noelle/
Jillian https://www.instagram.com/jillian.batt
Alexander https://www.instagram.com/i8athumbtack/
Brian https://www.instagram.com/thesupertoken
Sylvia https://www.instagram.com/sylviamariclaire
Yeshua https://www.instagram.com/yeshuakaliq/
If you live in Los Angeles and want to Audition to be on React, fill out the form below! https://airtable.com/appqriwWX9SCxKl5Y/shrltJoQXJFs7Cz4z
Producers Nicole https://www.instagram.com/nicolemiizuka/
Ash https://www.instagram.com/ashguenin/
Kimmy Jimenez https://www.instagram.com/kimmydoesstuff/
Michael https://www.instagram.com/michaelwalkerrr/
Ember https://www.instagram.com/emburgler/
VP of Content - Nicole Iizuka Executive Producer - Nicole Iizuka VP of Production â€“ Kevin Lee Line Producer - Anthony Mugnolo Producer, PVF - Ashley Guenin Producer, PVF - Kimmy Jimenez Culinary Producer, PVF Michael Walker Associate Producer, PVF - Ember Knight
Episode Produced by Nicole Iizuka Technical Director - Stephen Miller Talent Producer - Annie Knudsen Production Manager - Brendon Holl Production Coordinator - Jake Kelley Production Coordinator - Alesha Braden Casting Coordinator - Alexandra Sheffield Casting Coordinator - Zach Holmstrom Studio Technician - Micah Fusco Studio Technician- Julian Steinberg
Camera Operator - Kurran Brown Culinary AP - Kevin Duffin Culinary Coordinator - Lexi McCoy-Caso Production Assistant - Ciprian Robielos Production Assistant - Steven GirÃ³n
Set Medic - Mark Kirkendall
Editor - Gib Hanson Post Production Supervisor - Doug Brady Thumbnail Graphics - Tyson Goudie Supervising Editor - Ryan Johnson Assistant Editor - Jay Acuna Filmed on 2/16/2024

text.tags: people vs food; react food; peoplevsfood; try not to; disney parks; people vs food disney; react food disney; disney travel; disney world; food trivia; eating food; knew it or chew it; disney tips; disney trip; food challengeðŸ”¥; food challenge video; food challenge; taste test; food trivia challenge; knew it or chew it disney; food trivia quiz; food trivia questions and answers; disney world food; disney park food; best food from disney parks;
text.title: Disney Park's BEST Food! | Knew It AND Chew It
text.p: - We're testing our reactors' Disney trivia knowledge
with a epic "Knew It and Chew It"
with delicious park bites for our winners.
- Wait, only the person who gets it right
They're all good. - Dude, let's go.
- Ready for some food. - Now I'm fired up.
- Yeah, yeah. Now that I know it's good, I'm ready.
What was the Disneyland location used for
before it was a theme park?
- I don't know, actually. A parking lot.
- You guys are thinking very commercial.
No, I'm just kidding. - [Ash] Close, but no.
- I can't believe I knew that.
Literally, an orange grove in California.
- [Ash] All right, Jayka, you knew it,
so you get to chew it.
Let's see what you're eating. - [Jayka] Oh my gosh.
- Let's go. - And it's like a Mickey.
Oh my gosh. I can smell it. - It's so magical.
- And I didn't even eat breakfast.
- [Ash] This is arguably one of the cutest
and tastiest Mickey-shaped foods in the park.
- Nice. I'm gonna take a little bite.
- I'm gonna pick up the whole thing.
- You earned that all by yourself. How is it?
- This is probably the best cinnamon roll of my life.
- It really does conjure up the Disneyland feeling.
Man, this is so good. I love cinnamon rolls.
- Doesn't Mickey-shaped food just taste better?
- Oh my gosh. - Although I do feel bad,
it's kinda like I'm eating Mickey Mouse.
- It doesn't even have eyes. You're fine.
- I mean, a little sad. - Yeah.
- If I ask you guys a question
and neither of you know the answer,
then neither of you get to chew it and I get to chew it.
And you don't want big, bad chef Ash chewing it.
- No. - We can't let her get that.
- What is the final ingredient that young Tiana
- I didn't even finish my question.
I know that I'm, apparently, I'm gonna have to be speedy.
- I will give you this one, but I swear to God, Brian,
if you don't let me finish my question here on forth.
- Does it go to me? - Okay.
- She pours something, I feel like.
- Like hot sauce. - Because they're literally
like, and then after she's like,
- I'm gonna say hot sauce. - Correct.
- I'm so into it. - Oh, that looks tasty.
- That looks bomb. - Get a little shot
of that right there. - [Sylvia] Oh, yeah.
- Have you been to Tiana's Palace yet?
- No, I haven't. - Oh my God.
- The lines are literally like four hours long.
- [Ash] Oh, really? - So this is gonna be
- Oh, wait. I need to tell you what it is.
From the newly opened Tiana's Palace House at Disneyland,
we've got a bowl of their delicious house gumbo
made with just the right amount of hot sauce.
- Can I just smell it? - Yeah, get in there.
- Oh, that smells amazing. - That's just, like, insane.
- [Alexander] Go with the sausage and the rice.
- It's just stick to your ribs food.
- I'm so glad I knew it.
- I wanna take this, like, home, but the recipe.
- Are you guys excited for the new
- Yes, I'm so excited. - [Yeshua] There's a ride?
- They're, like, changing Splash Mountain into-
- I'm so excited. - That sounds cool.
With all of the other things that you have switched up,
it's about time that you switch up
one of the most outdated things that you have done.
What household snack was invented at Disneyland?
- A snack was invented at Disneyland?
the ice cream sandwich with the cookies on it.
- Chips. Like, is it a type of chip?
It was created at the Frito Restaurant.
- It's a cake, a funnel cake on top of a hot dog.
- I love hot dogs, guys. This is not even funny.
to eat at the Magic Kingdom?
at Casey's Corner on Main Street.
- Is it like a funnel cake?
- I'm a big funnel cake guy. - Really?
- So this is a big loss for me.
- [Ash] One of the crazier dishes offered
at Casey's Corner in Magic Kingdom,
crispy funnel cake, and powdered sugar.
I bet the strawberry jam with it too is insane.
- That is good. - Does it work?
Like, you like the sweet and savory?
- Yeah, this works a lot. - Okay.
- No, I'm not, because this is such a bright idea.
Like, a hot dog and funnel cake, but in one.
- This is awful, but I would eat this for breakfast.
about liking a hot dog, you know?
- And see, I don't feel like it's caveman.
does the owner of Trader Sam's Grog Grotto originate?
- Oh, like a traitor? Or like a trader?
- No. - I think like a trader.
- Think of, like, Trader Joe. But this is Trader Sam.
- Okay, so Trader Sam's is in Frontier Land.
- There was recently a movie made about it.
- Oh, was it the Thunder Mountain?
- No, yeah. See, it's not it.
It's not it. It's not it. - That's not swamp.
- Damn it. I can literally see it too.
I can see it. I waited in that line.
- All right, Sylvia. That was your win again.
- Let's see what you're gonna eat.
- [Yeshua] What the heck? - Oh my God.
- [Video] You know about Disney's Tonga Toast, right?
- [Video] Inspired items like these macadamia nut pancakes
- [Video] But the signature item is Tonga Toast,
a banana stuffed sourdough French toast
rolled in cinnamon sugar, served with a strawberry compote.
kind of a steal. - I mean, it's huge.
- I love bananas. - I love banana, too.
I put it in every dessert I can.
- [Ash] This is my favorite dish in all of Disney's parks.
A deep fried banana stuffed delectable breakfast item
called Tonga Toast, which is found at the Kona Cafe
in Disney's Polynesian Resort in Disney World.
- Guys, what did I do to deserve this?
Just know my Disney facts. - You know things.
You know trivia. - [Jayka] I'm so smart.
usually not a big fan of sweets, but that looks insane.
Okay, take a little dip. Take a little dip.
- I can't look. I can't look.
- This is the best day ever.
- [Jillian] Covering my ears, closing my eyes.
- Oh my God. - It's even like
Hawaiians really know what they're doing.
- [Yeshua] Duh. I don't want to hear it.
I don't wanna hear it. - I'm so sorry for you.
- So The Polynesian is where The Beatles
- That's pretty sad. - That's kind of, like, funny,
but like, also, like, really sucks.
I think he was visiting Disney World,
and that's where the paperwork was delivered to him,
and he signed his signature to end The Beatles.
- That is so, like, anticlimactic, you know?
- It's, like, him at the happiest place.
- Yeah. Like, and also very ironic.
- Disney World didn't exist at that point, right?
- I wonder if being there made it better
or if it ruined his experience.
Like, he can never go back, you know?
- I don't think he can go back anyways.
- She's like, "Wait, that guy's really not alive right now?

From Cafe Daisy and Mickey's Toontown,
we've got a kooky but delicious concoction.
A cheese pizza flop over topped with Parmesan and parsley.
- [Ash] And because neither of you knew it.
- You get to chew it. - Yes. Okay. Wow.
- [Alexander] Is that just covered in Parmesan too?
- Oh boy. Hold on, let me.
- A flop over. - Yep. Flop over.
- They didn't even think hard for the name. Yeah.
- They literally just took a pizza, sliced it up,
and then said, "Hold on. What if?"
- Oh my God. I'm so confused. How do I eat this?
Like, what is the right- - Get in there.
Get in there. - Wrong or right way?
- [Ash] Go for it, girl. Stop overthinking it.
What was the first Disney Park
built outside of the United States?
out of the United States, that would be Disneyland Paris.
- No. Neither one of you got it correct.
Was it the Disneyland in Japan?
- Is there a different name for it?
- Wait, the first - I need the proper names.
least favorite person in the room.
- Okay, I'm just saying it backwards.
Got it, got it, got it.
And I hate you for that.
- If you love all things Baymax.
- That's so cute. - Oh my God. That's so cute.

and it's driving me up the wall.

what can you shape Mickey to look like that's food?

we've got a plate of the most perfect sweet for any kid.
